name: Slack Albumlist
description: A Flask webserver for scraping and sharing albums in Slack

APP_SETTINGS.description: Which config class of settings to use (see: config.py).

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying magic Flask stuff.

APP_TOKEN_BOT.description: The config looks for Slack integration tokens starting wtih APP_TOKEN. These are used to allow access to any of the /slack/[endpoints].

SLACK_OAUTH_TOKEN.description: The oauth bearer token used to make requests to the Slack API

LIST_NAME.description: A name given for the team's album list.
